casebody.data:
Darlene A. CHAPDELAINE
v.
TOWN OF EASTFORD et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2016

Darlene A. Chapdelaine, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Emily E. Holland and Caleb Hamel, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 167 Conn.App. 901, 140 A.3d 1114 (2016), is denied.
